25 //Global, bad but should be safe in this case
26 argparse::ArgumentParser parser("Parser");
27 
28 bool initParser(argparse::ArgumentParser &parser, int argc, char **argv){
29  //Global, all image_processing nodes should have these options.
30  parser.add_argument()
31  .names({"-v", "--video"})
32  .description("Enable video output for this node.")
33  .required(false);
34 
35  parser.add_argument()
36  .names({"-s", "--subscribe"})
37  .description("Override the subscription topic.")
38  .required(false);
39 
40  parser.add_argument()
41  .names({"-p", "--publish"})
42  .description("Override the publication topic.")
43  .required(false);
44 
45  parser.add_argument()
46  .names({"-n", "--name"})
47  .description("Override the node name.")
48  .required(false);
49 
50  parser.enable_help();
51 
52  auto err = parser.parse(argc, const_cast<const char**>(argv));
53  if (err) {
54  std::stringstream ss;
55  ss << err;
56  ROS_ERROR("argparse error: %s", ss.str().c_str());
57  return false;
58  }
59 
60  return true;
61 }
62 
63 void ImageProcessingLink::imageCallback(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg){
64  cv::Mat frame = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg, "bgr8")->image;
65  cv::Mat channels[3];
66  split(frame,channels);
67 
68  // Debug imshow
69  if (parser.exists("video")){
70  bb_util::vision::imshow("Blue channel", channels[0]);
71  }
72 
73  // Translate into ROS format.
74  sensor_msgs::ImagePtr repub =
75  cv_bridge::CvImage(std_msgs::Header(), "mono8", channels[0]).toImageMsg();
76  this->pub.publish(repub);
77 }
78 
79 int main(int argc, char **argv){
80  // Parser initialisation
81  if (!initParser(parser, argc, argv)) return -1;
82 
83  // Parser decode
84  if (parser.exists("help")){
85  parser.print_help();
86  return 0;
87  }
88 
89  // If parser option defined, use it, else default.
90  // publish to
91  std::string pub_topic =
92  parser.exists("publish") ?
93  parser.get<std::string>("publish") :
94  "blue_frames";
95 
96  // subscribe to
97  std::string sub_topic =
98  parser.exists("subscribe") ?
99  parser.get<std::string>("subscribe") :
100  "blurred_frames";
101 
102  // name
103  std::string node_name =
104  parser.exists("name") ?
105  parser.get<std::string>("name") :
106  "blue_channel_node";
107 
108  ROS_INFO(" = IPL configuration = ");
109  ROS_INFO("Node name: %s", node_name.c_str());
110  ROS_INFO("Subscribing to: %s", sub_topic.c_str());
111  ROS_INFO("Publishing to: %s", pub_topic.c_str());
112 
113  ros::init(argc, argv, node_name.c_str());
114  ros::NodeHandle n;
115 
116  ImageProcessingLink ipl(n, sub_topic, pub_topic);
117 
118  ros::spin();
119 
120  return 0;
121 }
